metrics.name: CPU_TIME
metrics.description: CPU time spent on the query

metrics.name: CUMULATIVE_CARDINALITY
metrics.description: Cumulative cardinality of the query

metrics.name: CUMULATIVE_ROWS_SCANNED
metrics.description: Cumulative number of rows scanned by the query

metrics.name: EXTRA_INFO
metrics.description: Unique operator metrics

metrics.name: LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent executing the entire query

metrics.name: QUERY_NAME
metrics.description: The SQL string of the query

metrics.name: RESULT_SET_SIZE
metrics.description: The size of the result

metrics.name: ROWS_RETURNED
metrics.description: The number of rows returned by the query

description: metrics that are collected during query execution

metrics.name: BLOCKED_THREAD_TIME
metrics.description: Time spent waiting for a thread to become available

metrics.name: SYSTEM_PEAK_BUFFER_MEMORY
metrics.description: Peak memory usage of the system

metrics.name: SYSTEM_PEAK_TEMP_DIR_SIZE
metrics.description: Peak size of the temporary directory

metrics.name: TOTAL_MEMORY_ALLOCATED
metrics.description: The total memory allocated by the buffer manager.

description: metrics that are collected during file operations

metrics.name: ATTACH_LOAD_STORAGE_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent loading from storage.

metrics.name: ATTACH_REPLAY_WAL_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent replaying the WAL file.

metrics.name: CHECKPOINT_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent running checkpoints

metrics.name: COMMIT_LOCAL_STORAGE_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent committing the transaction-local storage.

metrics.name: TOTAL_BYTES_READ
metrics.description: The total bytes read by the file system.

metrics.name: TOTAL_BYTES_WRITTEN
metrics.description: The total bytes written by the file system.

metrics.name: WAITING_TO_ATTACH_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent waiting to ATTACH a file.

metrics.name: WAL_REPLAY_ENTRY_COUNT
metrics.description: The total number of entries to replay in the WAL.

metrics.name: WRITE_TO_WAL_LATENCY
metrics.description: Time spent writing to the WAL.

metrics.name: ALL_OPTIMIZERS
metrics.description: Enables all optimizers

metrics.name: CUMULATIVE_OPTIMIZER_TIMING
metrics.description: Time spent in all optimizers

metrics.name: PHYSICAL_PLANNER
metrics.description: The time spent generating the physical plan

metrics.name: PHYSICAL_PLANNER_COLUMN_BINDING
metrics.description: The time spent binding the columns in the logical plan to physical columns

metrics.name: PHYSICAL_PLANNER_CREATE_PLAN
metrics.description: The time spent creating the physical plan

metrics.name: PHYSICAL_PLANNER_RESOLVE_TYPES
metrics.description: The time spent resolving the types in the logical plan to physical types

metrics.name: PLANNER
metrics.description: The time to generate the logical plan from the parsed SQL nodes.

metrics.name: PLANNER_BINDING
metrics.description: The time taken to bind the logical plan.

description: metrics that are collected for each operator

metrics.name: OPERATOR_CARDINALITY
metrics.description: Cardinality of the operator

metrics.name: OPERATOR_NAME
metrics.description: Name of the operator

metrics.name: OPERATOR_ROWS_SCANNED
metrics.description: Number of rows scanned by the operator

metrics.name: OPERATOR_TIMING
metrics.description: Time spent in the operator

metrics.name: OPERATOR_TYPE
metrics.description: Type of the operator

description: metrics that are collected for each optimizer
